name: TOMORROW'S FOUNDATION
briefDescription: Tomorrow’s Foundation was started in 1991, with the objective of mainstreaming the street & slum children of Kolkata. The focus was on education and empowerment but the goal was a holistic development. The journey began on the terrace of Mother Teresa’s, ‘Normal Hriday’ in Kalighat, (Kolkata Municipal Corporation, Ward No. – 83), to provide non-formal education to a handful of the neglected children from the street of the adjoining red light area. It started a collaborative intervention in the year 1993 – 1994, with Kolkata Municipal Corporation (KMC). This collaboration was possible because it was a strategic partnership on a ‘win-win model’. The experiment undertaken jointly by GO-NGO Partnership at Dharmadas Trust Model School( Govertm
